title: can some one gift me barbarian sion for only 375 rp while its still on sale?
body:
i was wondering if one of you kind people would mind gifting me barbarian Sion for 375 rp, i know you probably wont but it would be very appreciated if you did. I would also return the favor sometime soon when i can get some rp. If you wan tot gift it to me my username is: cryptid

cheers!{{champion:14}}

replies.body: I'll get it for you if you dust my bean bag.
